import React from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {FaMinusCircle,FaPlusCircle,FaTrash} from 'react-icons/fa' import { addToCart,deleteFromCart } from '../actions/cartAction' const CartScreen = () => { const cartState = useSelector(state => state.cartReducer) const cartItems = cartState.cartItems const dispatch = useDispatch() return ( <>

Card Items

{ cartItems.map(items => ( <>
{items.name} [{items.varient}]
{" "}Price : {items.quantity} x {items.prices[0][items.varient]} = {" "} {items.price}
Quantity :   {dispatch(addToCart(items,items.quantity - 1,items.varient));}}/>   {items.quantity}   {dispatch(addToCart(items,items.quantity + 1,items.varient));}}/>
)) }

Payment Info

 ) } export default CartScreen
